mapper.sql: XQQZ_ID, XQQZ_TITLE, XQQZ_NR, XQQZ_FBSJ, XQQZ_FBR, XQQZ_DELFLAG, XQQZ_TYPE
mapper.select: select XQQZ_ID, XQQZ_TITLE, XQQZ_NR,substring(XQQZ_NR,1,200) NR,(Select CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), XQQZ_FBSJ, 20) ) FBSJ, XQQZ_FBR, XQQZ_DELFLAG, XQQZ_TYPE from XQQZ where XQQZ_ID = #{xqqzId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into XQQZ (XQQZ_ID, XQQZ_TITLE, XQQZ_NR, XQQZ_FBSJ, XQQZ_FBR, XQQZ_DELFLAG, XQQZ_TYPE) values (#{xqqzId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xqqzTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xqqzNr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xqqzFbsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xqqzFbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xqqzDelflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xqqzType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into XQQZ
XQQZ_ID,
XQQZ_TITLE,
XQQZ_NR,
XQQZ_FBSJ,
XQQZ_FBR,
XQQZ_DELFLAG,
XQQZ_TYPE,
#{xqqzId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{xqqzTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{xqqzNr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{xqqzFbsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{xqqzFbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{xqqzDelflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{xqqzType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update XQQZ
XQQZ_TITLE = #{xqqzTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XQQZ_NR = #{xqqzNr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XQQZ_FBSJ = #{xqqzFbsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
XQQZ_FBR = #{xqqzFbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XQQZ_DELFLAG = #{xqqzDelflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XQQZ_TYPE = #{xqqzType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where XQQZ_ID = #{xqqzId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update XQQZ set XQQZ_TITLE = #{xqqzTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XQQZ_NR = #{xqqzNr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XQQZ_FBSJ = #{xqqzFbsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, XQQZ_FBR = #{xqqzFbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XQQZ_DELFLAG = #{xqqzDelflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XQQZ_TYPE = #{xqqzType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where XQQZ_ID = #{xqqzId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from XQQZ where XQQZ_DELFLAG=1
and XQQZ_TITLE like '%${xqqzTitle}%'
and XQQZ_TYPE like '%${xqqzType}%'
and XQQZ_TITLE like '%${ltbqName}%'
or XQQZ_ID in (select XQQZ_ID from LTBQ_XQQZ where LTBQ_ID =#{ltbqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

select XQQZ_ID, XQQZ_TITLE, XQQZ_NR,substring(XQQZ_NR,1,200) NR,(Select CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), XQQZ_FBSJ, 20) ) FBSJ, XQQZ_FBR, XQQZ_DELFLAG, XQQZ_TYPE,(select XQQZLXGL_LXMC from XQQZLXGL where XQQZLXGL_ID = XQQZ_TYPE) lxmc, (select count(*) from XQQZ_REVIEW where XQQZ_ID = t2.XQQZ_ID) pls from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from XQQZ T where XQQZ_DELFLAG=1
and XQQZ_TITLE like '%${xqqzTitle}%'
and XQQZ_TYPE like '%${xqqzType}%'
and XQQZ_TITLE like '%${ltbqName}%'
or XQQZ_ID in (select XQQZ_ID from LTBQ_XQQZ where LTBQ_ID =#{ltbqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
order by T.XQQZ_FBSJ ASC ) as t1 order by XQQZ_FBSJ DESC) as t2 order by XQQZ_FBSJ ASC

select XQQZ_ID, XQQZ_TITLE, XQQZ_NR,substring(XQQZ_NR,1,200) NR, (Select CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), XQQZ_FBSJ, 20)) FBSJ, XQQZ_FBR, XQQZ_DELFLAG, XQQZ_TYPE from XQQZ where XQQZ_FBR = #{xqqzFbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(*) from XQQZ where XQQZ_DELFLAG=1
and XQQZ_TITLE like '%${xqqzTitle}%'
and XQQZ_FBR like '%${xqqzFbr}%'
and XQQZ_TYPE like '%${xqqzType}%'
and XQQZ_TITLE like '%${ltbqName}%'
or XQQZ_ID in (select XQQZ_ID from LTBQ_XQQZ where LTBQ_ID =#{ltbqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

select XQQZ_ID, XQQZ_TITLE, XQQZ_NR,substring(XQQZ_NR,1,200) NR,(Select CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), XQQZ_FBSJ, 20) ) FBSJ, XQQZ_FBR, XQQZ_DELFLAG, XQQZ_TYPE,(select XQQZLXGL_LXMC from XQQZLXGL where XQQZLXGL_ID = XQQZ_TYPE) lxmc, (select count(*) from XQQZ_REVIEW where XQQZ_ID = t2.XQQZ_ID) pls from (select top ${currentPageSize} * from (select top(${pageNum}*${pageSize}) * from XQQZ T where XQQZ_DELFLAG=1
and XQQZ_TITLE like '%${xqqzTitle}%'
and XQQZ_FBR like '%${xqqzFbr}%'
and XQQZ_TYPE like '%${xqqzType}%'
and XQQZ_TITLE like '%${ltbqName}%'
or XQQZ_ID in (select XQQZ_ID from LTBQ_XQQZ where LTBQ_ID =#{ltbqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
order by T.XQQZ_FBSJ ASC ) as t1 order by XQQZ_FBSJ DESC) as t2 order by XQQZ_FBSJ ASC
